trait_forder_desc0:"This character is at home close to water and will suffer no Advantage penalty in battles when attacking across straights or rivers."

column1: trait_desert_warrior_desc0:"The punishing sun and beating heat of the desert is no foe to this character."

trait_reaver_desc0:"The Reaver longs for loot almost as much as victory: if there is anything of value to be had they will find it."
